description: Ordered Stirling numbers s(n,k) of the second kind.
comments: In other words, list all Stirling numbers of the second kind, sort and remove duplicates.
links: David W. Wilson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
mathematica: s2 = Union[Flatten[Table[Table[StirlingS2[n, k], {k, 1, 100}], {n, 1, 100}]]]; Table[s2[[j]], {j, 1, 100}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 01 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Corrected by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 21 2007
